parameters.query:
SELECT
  id,
  source,
  merchant,
  total_amount,
  currency,
  installments_total,
  installments_paid,
  installment_amount,
  purchase_date,
  next_due_date,
  final_due_date,
  status,
  remaining_payments,
  remaining_amount,
  is_overdue,
  is_due_soon
FROM finance.v_active_installments

INSERT INTO finance.installments (
  source, merchant, total_amount, currency,
  installments_total, installment_amount,
  purchase_date, next_due_date, final_due_date
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.source }}',
  '{{ $json.merchant.replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  {{ $json.totalAmount }},
  '{{ $json.currency }}',
  {{ $json.installmentsTotal }},
  {{ $json.installmentAmount }},
  {{ $json.purchaseDate ? "'" + $json.purchaseDate + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.nextDueDate ? "'" + $json.nextDueDate + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.finalDueDate ? "'" + $json.finalDueDate + "'" : 'NULL' }}
)
RETURNING id, source, merchant, total_amount, status
